general.help:
--------VRC Commands--------
1. [vrc login] | Login to your VRC account (recommended in private chat)
2. [vrc all friends] | Get all friends' information
3. [vrc search user] [text] | Search for a player
4. [vrc search world] [text] | Search for a world
5. [vrc switch language] | Switch plugin language
general.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, please check the backend output.
general.empty_search_keyword: Search keyword cannot be empty, please resend.
general.empty_message: Message cannot be empty, please resend.
general.invalid_ordinal_range: Ordinal out of range, please resend.

login.not_logged_in: Not logged in or login info expired. Please send [vrc login] in private chat to log in again.
login.login_expired: Login expired, please log in again.
login.overwrite_login_info: Cached login info detected. After this login, the old info will be overwritten.
login.send_login_info:
Please send your account and password separated by a space. Send 0 to cancel login.
Tip: The bot will save your login status. Please log in only if you trust the bot.
login.send_2fa_code: Please send the email verification code or 2FA code within {second} seconds.
login.use_cached_login_info: Cached login info detected, trying to log in again.
login.invalid_account: Incorrect username or password, please resend. If you are sure your credentials are 100% correct, please check your email for a new device verification.
login.invalid_info_format: Message format is incorrect. Please resend your account and password separated by a space.

friend.empty_friend: The specified friend does not exist.
friend.empty_friend_request: You currently have no friend requests.
friend.exist_friend: You are already friends, please do not add again.
friend.incoming_request: You have received a friend request, please check.
friend.outgoing_request: You have sent a friend request, please notify the recipient.
friend.no_request: There are no friend requests between you.

user.send_user_name: Please send the player name you want to search for.
user.reply_index: Please send the serial number of the player you want to view, enter 0 to cancel
user.reply_index_add: Send [Add 1] to add the first player as a friend

world.send_world_name: Please send the name of the world you want to search for.
